ai-tha-ap301:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap301:2.4_0: In the fruit of mango grove.
ai-tha-ap301:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap301:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kuṇḍiya.
ai-tha-ap301:5.1_0: The ninth part of mangoes and senior monks.
